title: Chocolate and almond cake bars
ingredients: ['60g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '55g plain chocolate chips', '65g margarine', '200g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '45g cream cheese', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '55g chopped almonds']
